definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Green tea has the characteristics of "green leaves in a clear soup with a strong astringent taste ".
sentences.chinese: 綠茶的“綠葉在一個清湯具有強烈澀味特色”。
葡萄酒中的苦澀味就是單寧。

sentences.english: Cause when baked fried grouper fry, and will produce bitterness and astringency.
sentences.chinese: 會造成煎焙時有煎斑，且會產生苦味及澀味。

sentences.english: The endosperm of the nut owes its marked degree of astringency.
sentences.chinese: 堅果的胚乳由於存在丹寧，所以有顯著的澀味。

sentences.english: Although bubble, but avoid resistance time mopping, or GuSeWei thick.
sentences.chinese: 雖然耐泡，但忌長時間浸泡，否則苦澀味濃。

sentences.english: Born of bananas from banana contains astringency of a large number of tannins.
sentences.chinese: 生香蕉的澀味來自於香蕉中含有的大量的鞣酸。

sentences.english: If the onions are burnt, they will make the soup bitter.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥不可以燒焦，否則湯會略帶苦澀味。

sentences.english: This white tea made from tea leaves, less bitter taste, and taste sweet.
sentences.chinese: 以這種白葉茶製成的茶，苦澀味較輕，而滋味甘甜。

sentences.english: Primarily processed tea seed oil is in deep color and has bitter taste, and it needs to be refined.
sentences.chinese: 經初加工的茶葉籽油色澤深，帶有苦澀味，需精加工。

sentences.english: There are a large amount of tea polyphenols in tea. Tea polyphenols show great effects on astringency of tea taste.
sentences.chinese: 茶葉中含有的大量茶多酚對茶葉澀味有重要作用。

sentences.english: It is also one of the main sources to bitterness and acerbity of liquor .
sentences.chinese: 它還是白酒苦味或澀味的主要來源之一。

definition: mouth and teeth/enunciation/to articulate/diction/age (of cattle, horses etc)
